name: Alfa
0:
”Alexa, ask Alfa to start my car with PIN XXXX.”
”Alexa, ask Alfa how much gas is in my car.”
”Alexa, ask Alfa to find the nearest gas station.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alfa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ALFA SKILL FOR AMAZON ALEXA

Connect with your Alfa Romeo Brand vehicle from the comfort of your home, using your voice. Simply ask Alexa on an Alexa-enabled device to start/stop the engine(1), lock/unlock the doors(1), check fuel status and more.

With Navigation, you can ask Alexa to find restaurants and other destinations and then send the addresses directly to your vehicle for added convenience.
 
SUPPORTED VEHICLES

• 2021 and newer Alfa Romeo Giulia
• 2021 and newer Alfa Romeo Stelvio
• 2023 Alfa Romeo Tonale 

EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS

• Must be equipped with the G2.5 radio with 8.8-inch touchscreen, 8.8-inch touchscreen with NAV or 10.25-inch touchscreen, 10.25-inch touchscreen with NAV
• Must have account set up with SiriusXM Guardian™(2) or Alfa Connect(3) and be in a trial or paid subscription

SAMPLE COMMANDS

• “Alexa, Ask Alfa to start my vehicle with Voice Code XXXX.”
• “Alexa, Ask Alfa how much gas is in my vehicle.”
To get a complete list of commands, say, “Alexa, Ask Alfa for help with my vehicle.”

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

To link your vehicle to Amazon Alexa:

1. Download the Amazon Alexa app on your iOS® or Android™ device
2. Launch the app, then tap MORE and go to SKILLS & GAMES
3. Search for Alfa Romeo, then select by tapping ENABLE
4. Select ENABLE TO USE
5. Log in using your Alfa Connect Account ID and password
6. Create your Voice Code on the Setting screen then select AUTHORIZE

(1) Vehicle must be registered with SiriusXM Guardian™ or Alfa Connect, be in an active and usable cellular range, have an active subscription, and properly equipped with remote features. You are responsible for using remote features in accordance with any laws, rules or ordinances in effect in your vehicle’s location. See Terms of Service for service limitations.

(2) All SiriusXM Guardian™-equipped vehicles come with a 12-month trial effective on the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue SiriusXM Guardian. SiriusXM Guardian is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See Uconnect® and SiriusXM Guardian Terms of Service for complete service limitations. 

(3) All vehicles properly equipped to receive connected services come with a 3-month trial of the full suite of Alfa Connect services effective from the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue or renew services. Alfa Connect is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See the applicable Terms of Service for complete terms and conditions, including service limitations.
